Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the quotes attributed to Thomas Jefferson and Donald Trump in the meme are not genuine.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the meme by stating that it contrasts quotes from two presidents on the subject of the press.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove the authenticity of the quotes in the meme.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the meme accurately represents the views of Thomas Jefferson and Donald Trump on the press, which is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim suggests that the quotes in the meme may have been generated as satire or as a result of misinterpretation.
